chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x) in eqc m0 z t <-> eqc m z t

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
Md0.k = zero : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t < -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
eqc_B_CN : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
eqc_B_CS : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t -> eqc m z t
eqc_eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) x (A m k x) -> eqc m z t -> eqc (B m k x) z t
nc_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x) in nc m0 = nc m
eqc_B_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) z t -> eqc m z t
expf_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> expf (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z t < -> expf m z t
eqco_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqco m k x z t < -> eqc m z t
Iter_f_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x) in Iter (MF.f m0) i z = Iter (MF.f m) i z
eqc_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (bottom m k x) /\ eqc m x (top m k x)
eqc_B_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) (A m k x) (top m k x)
A_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in A (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = A m k1 z
cA_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA m k1 z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA_1 m k1 z
A_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in A_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = A_1 m k1 z
eqc_B_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc (B m k x) x (bottom m k x)
planarity_crit_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let m0 := B m zero x in let y := A m zero x in planar m < -> planar m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y)
nc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in nc m0 = nc m + (if eqc_dec m0 x (A m k x) then 0 else 1)
cF_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z = cF m z
cF_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z = cF_1 m z
cA_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA_1 m k z
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m
exd_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z
inv_hmap_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x))
eqco = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart) => eqc (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) z t : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
eqc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (top m k x)
top_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (H : inv_hmap m), succ m zero x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in top m0 zero z = (if MA0.expo_dec m x z H then x else top m zero z)
